column4: is there a documentation viewer that can access all documentation installed with apt?
what if i want to look at the PIL docs
no manual entry exists for python imaging
ok i guess documentation is stored in /usr/share/doc. thanks for the lack of help
i figured this out by typing
by the way, an easier way to figure out where a package puts things is: dpkg -L PACKAGE
sorry, i wasn't paying attention, i was trying to fix it
i was just wondering if there was an app that allowed you to index and view /usr/share/doc
one problem is I'm not sure if there are restrictions on the format.  Could be html, plaintext, pdf, etc.
